transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Haan sir dekhiye aapke paas aaya hai kya?

Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Aapke paas silica sand ka mail aaya hoga, check kariye aaya hai kya aapke paas?
Customer: Mail par, mail par.
Customer: Mail par check karta hu.

Customer: Aur maine ye silica sand ka bhi whatsapp par kar diya na wo.
Executive: Whatsapp pe aapne kiya tha?
Customer: Whatsapp pe kiye the aap, kyun nahi kar raha tha na, abhi dekhiye mail pe aaya hoga just aapke paas.
Customer: Nahi kar diya hai.
Customer: Haan ek baar aap check kar sakte hai, mail pe, mail pe aap check karenge, abhi just aaya hoga.
Customer: Abhi toh nahi aaya hai.

Customer: Abhi nahi aaya sir?

Customer: Ticket issue ka aisa aaya hai, baaki toh nahi aaya.
Customer: Abhi aaya sir, abhi just aaya hoga dekhiye.
Customer: Mail pe.
Customer: Mere mail pe aata hai.
Executive: Aapki mail id mai aapko bata deta hu, jo ye mail id aap, haan ye wali mail id hai na, UBpatel9898@gmail.com.
Customer: UBpatel pe aaya hu.
Executive: Haan haan, theek hai, theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai, aaya hai kya?
Customer: Usme dekh leta hu, ye toh mera dusra id hai na.
Executive: Accha accha, ek baar mai line pe ek baar check karenge kya?
Customer: Haan chalu rakhiye.


Executive: Aur ek baar mujhe photo send kar dijiyega apne products ka na, shayad mai apne end se bhi add kar dunga.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Mai keh raha hu sir ek baar aapne na, ye hum ye add karne ke baad ek photo na aapki profile ki send kar dijiyega, glass grade silica sand mein, to isme mai add kar dunga apne according agar aap chahenge to.
Customer: Theek hai, ye toh ek normal photos aapne listed jo kar rakhi hai yaha pe, but kuch jo sometimes kya hota hai kuch profile ko attractive banane ke liye do chaar products mai jo hai users ke add kar sakta hu agar aap bolenge to.
Customer: Aap toh kar dijiye na wo, complete kar dijiye na profile.
Executive: Wo mai apne end se kar dunga mai.
Customer: Haan wo toh mujhe dekhiye karna hi padega, wo mai aapko permission lena bahut zaruri hai na, kyunki aap apne according agar bolenge ki mai kar lunga toh aap bahut badhiya hai, agar nahi kar payenge toh mai apne end se karne wala hu. Sunil ji ek baar aap mail check kariye, mail pe aa gaya hoga sir aapke paas.
Customer: Kar diya, kar diya feedback.
Executive: De diya aapne?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai aur iska mujhe batayenge sir ek baar specification mein kya rakh sakte hai, kuch idea hai aapko?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Iska iska, quartz silica sand ka jo specification hai isme kya rakh sakte hai, aapne SI zero content mein rakhna tha 99% plus, ye chalega kya?
Customer: Haan ji, mesh size, mesh size, mesh size iska kya rehta hai 50 upon 100?
Executive: Kaun kaun se baat kar rahe the aap?
Executive: Mai baat kar raha hu quartz silica sand ka, quartz quartz na.
Customer: Haan mesh size rehti hai 50 se 80.
Customer: 50 to 80.
Executive: And iska toh ho gaya aur iska kya rehta hai sir, size ho gaya aapka.
Executive: Applications mein mere hisab se water filtration ya foundry casting kuch rehta hai kya?
Customer: Haan ji, glass manufacturer construction kya rakhe?
Executive: Glass ka alag rehta hai, quartz ka alag rehta hai.
Executive: Abrasive sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi, do minute, do minute chalu rakhiye ye open kar leta hu, uske baad mai bata hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan glass grade silica sand ka toh wo category dala hua hai na.
Customer: Haan abrasive dal rakha hai, toh wahi mai puch raha hu kyunki agar koi changes isme karna hai toh aap mujhe bata dijiye, waise toh mere khayal se jo aapne bataya tha last time wahi hoga nahi, ye toh sara cheez sahi hai isme koi issue nahi hoga right?
Customer: Haan wo toh wo toh wo toh lagbhag maine dal diya hai sab kuch.
Executive: Haan isme khali mai jo haan quartz silica sand mein jo reh gaya hai required, toh mere according isme photos reh gaya hai. Toh isme aapko do photos yaha pe listed karni padegi agar aap chahenge apne end se bhi kar sakte hai. Dusra China clay lamp hai na sir, China clay lamp mein bhi do photo aapko lagani padegi. Matlab zyada kaam nahi hai aapke paas, sara kaam already ho rakha hai, bas ye ek aapka China clay ka, ek quartz silica sand, in dono ka aapko category ko thoda proper add kar dijiye aur ek aapka glass grade silica sand hai, ye teen photos aap apne aap laga dijiye nahi toh agar apne aap nahi laga sakte mujhe bhej dijiye, mai add kar dunga agar aap bolenge google se add karne ke liye toh mai google se add kar dunga but wo aapke according hi hoga agar aap batayenge toh mujhe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai sir? Google ke according kar dijiye na.
Executive: Haan google ke according ye hoga na ki jaise agar maan lijiye suppose google se mai add karta hu, google pe agar bahut logo ke sath profile yaha pe listed ho gaye IndiaMART pe toh wo aapke hand mein add nahi ho payega. Agar wahi same product yaha pe listed hoga na toh copy to error ka option aa jata hai. Isliye mai aap se keh raha hu ek baar aap apne hand se karke dekhiye agar wo hota hai toh well and good nahi toh fir mai apne google se nikal ke kar dunga. Samajh rahe hai baat ko? Theek hai. Toh dono mein ek major different aa jata hai ki aapke apne hand se matlab hota hai ki aapki khud ki profile mein jo photo hoti hai wo aapki khud ki photo khichi hui hoti hai. Hai na? Abhi suppose kijiye aapke product mein kahi kaam kar rahe honge ya kaam chal raha hoga agar us photo ko aap seedhe put karke aap dalte hai na toh wo zyada effect padta hai as compared to google se. Google ek just like fake lagta hai clarity mein, samajh rahe hai baat ko? Isliye bol raha hu kyunki sab log wo yahi use karte hai aaj ki date mein. Ek baar karke dekhiye nahi hota toh baaki mai hu, theek hai sir?
Customer: Kar dunga mai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Okay okay sir, thank you so much sir, thank you sir, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with product listing photos.

- Customer wants to know specification for silica sand.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add photos to product listing.

- Executive explained how to add photos.

- Executive provided specifications for silica sand.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try adding photos.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- product listing, photos, silica sand, specifications
